components.name: Temperance
components.description: Eat not to dullness. Drink not to elevation.

components.name: Silence
components.description: Speak not but what may benefit others or yourself. Avoid trifling conversation.

components.name: Order
components.description: Let all your things have their places. Let each part of your business have its time.

components.name: Resolution
components.description: Resolve to perform what you ought. Perform without fail what you resolve.

components.name: Frugality
components.description: Make no expense but to do good to others or yourself.

components.name: Industry
components.description: Lose no time. Be always employed in something useful. Cut off all unnecessary actions.

components.name: Sincerity
components.description: Use no hurtful deceit. Think innocently and justly; and if you speak, speak accordingly.

components.name: Justice
components.description: Wrong none by doing injuries, or omitting the benefits that are your duty.

components.name: Moderation
components.description: Avoid extremes. Forbear resenting injuries so much as you think they deserve.

components.name: Cleanliness
components.description: Tolerate no uncleanness in body, clothes, or habitation.

components.name: Tranquility
components.description: Be not disturbed at trifles, or at accidents common or unavoidable.

components.name: Chastity
components.description: Rarely use venery but for health or offspring

components.name: Humility
components.description: Imitate Muhammed, Isa, Socrates, et al.

components.name: Learn Conversational Shqip
components.description: Anything that helps unlock the Albanian language in the spoken and/or written word.

components.name: Become a Software Engineer
components.description: Anything that helps develop your skills and creditentials when it comes to software engineering.

components.name: Earn More Than Expenses
components.description: Earn more than expenses, at least a monthly 5'000 AED as it would help a lot. Next goal would be to earn expenses from "rents": i.e., stable & automatic income.

components.name: Ten Push Ups a Day

components.description: Focus on Form; Establish a Routine. Ideal: Early enough to wake up before or around the Fajr azan.

components.name: Read for 20 minutes a Day
components.description: Focus on Form; Establish a Routine. Ideal: 4 hours every day.

components.description: Learn the Albanian Grammar rules when it comes to plural, adjectives, sex, ordinals, tense, and definites.
